summary: This is an email chain discussing the contents of two batches (BATCH003 and BATCH004) in the US v. Epstein Relativity database. BATCH003 contains data from the USAO-SDFL (U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of Florida) files, while BATCH004 contains OPR (Office of Professional Responsibility) materials, including emails and search term hits.

events.title: USAO-SDFL Files Batch Creation
events.description: Data from the USAO-SDFL files folder was compiled into BATCH003 for the US v. Epstein Relativity database.

events.title: OPR Materials Collection
events.description: OPR materials, including emails and search term hits, were collected and later included in BATCH004.

events.title: OPR Materials Update
events.description: Additional OPR materials were added to the collection for BATCH004.

keyFacts: The document references two batches in the US v. Epstein Relativity database: BATCH003 (USAO-SDFL files) and BATCH004 (OPR materials).
BATCH004 includes emails received from OPR and search terms run through those emails.
The email chain is from March 2021, discussing the organization and contents of evidence batches related to the Epstein case.
